message.startingTask.description: Message when the music generation task starts

message.startingUploadAudio.description: Message when the music generation task starts

message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when uploaded music exceeds the maximum number

message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when the upload of music fails

message.startUploadAudioFailed.description: Error message when starting the music generation task fails

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to start music generation task

message.generating.description: Message when music is being generated

message.noOperations.description: Message when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks, please generate music in the configuration panel on the left
